name: Flip of Light (itch)
description:
Precision Platforming with a Unique Twist

Taking inspiration from platformers of the last decade, Flip of Light will test genre veterans with mind-bending, gravity-swapping challenges. Run, jump, and flip your way through a variety of vibrant stages, each themed around one chromatic color.

Swap from ceiling to floor instantly with your signature move, the Light Flip!

 Use it to find and repair each segment of the Color Wheel, the beacon which gives the world its vibrancy.

Features:
  • Challenging but fair, fast-paced gameplay
  • Fresh and unique visual style
  • Clever level design with mechanics based around the main gimmick
  • Original soundtrack composed by the game's sole creator
  • Many optional collectables
Demo Available Now!

Listen to the OST on Bandcamp or Youtube :)

Full Version in Development

The full version of Flip of Light will contain many more stages and extra challenges, each with their own unique mechanics. Some of these include:

Barriers

Flip Blocks

Screen Wrapping

And Many More!
